name: refuge.LGBT
tagline: Providing technology resources for transgender, intersex, and gender nonconforming individuals.
body:
### Welcome to Refuge.lgbt
Refuge.lgbt is an organization that provides technology resources for transgender, intersex, and gender nonconforming individuals. 
So far we've made refugerestrooms and refuge housing.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
